title: ServiceFabric.BackupRestore
description: ServiceFabric.BackupRestore adds backup and restore features to your Reliable Stateful Services in Service Fabric. How to use this package: https://github.com/loekd/ServiceFabric.BackupRestore/blob/master/README.md

packOptions.summary: Adds some Service operations that enable simple backup and restore of state. Allows backups to be stored away from the cluster.
